ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila Sees Plyr -- Greeting
ResponseRule.description: Player reaches Mikhaila where she's trapped. Mikhaila can't move. Parts of her body (motor control) are shutting down as her condition worsens over time.

ResponseRule.name: Plyr Finds Mikhaila -- Early Visit
ResponseRule.description: Player reaches Mikhaila where she's trapped. Mikhaila can't move. The player is here early, before on a mission to reboot the space station. Parts of her body (motor control) are shutting down as her condition worsens over time.

ResponseRule.name: Plyr Finds Mikhaila -- Need to Reboot, Phantom
ResponseRule.description: Player reaches Mikhaila where she's trapped. Mikhaila can't move. Parts of her body (motor control) are shutting down as her condition worsens over time. Phantom (deadly alien) was present, banging on door (?).

ResponseRule.name: Plyr Finds Mikhaila -- Already Met, Need to Reboot, All Better
ResponseRule.description: Player has already met Mikhaila once, has gotten the quest to get her meds, has recovered her meds, and is now showing up needing to reboot the station AND give Mikhaila her meds all at once.

ResponseRule.name: Plyr Finds Mikhaila -- Already Met, Need to Reboot, No Meds
ResponseRule.description: Player has already met Mikhaila once, has gotten the quest to get her meds, has NOT recovered her meds, and is now showing up needing to reboot the station. Followup convo.

ResponseRule.name: Plyr Finds Mikhaila -- Power Rebooted, Plyr Has Meds
ResponseRule.description: Player reaches Mikhaila where she's trapped. Player hasn't seen her in person yet, but already has her meds and has already rebooted the Power Plant.

ResponseRule.name: Plyr Finds Mikhaila -- Power Rebooted, No Meds
ResponseRule.description: Player reaches Mikhaila where she's trapped. Player hasn't seen her in person yet, but has already rebooted the Power Plant. Player does not have her medications.

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila Followup Comments -- Sec Chief?
ResponseRule.description: Mikhaila wonder about the fate of the sec chief. She'd only play this line because the player either killed the sec chief or she perished in a fight w/ the aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila ClickMe Comments -- Pre Medicine 1
ResponseRule.description: Mikhaila comments before player has returned w/ meds for her.

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila ClickMe Comments -- Pre Medicine 2
ResponseRule.description: Mikhaila comments before player has returned w/ meds for her.

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila ClickMe Comments -- Pre Medicine 3
ResponseRule.description: Mikhaila comments before player has returned w/ meds for her.

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila ClickMe Comments -- Pre Medicine 4
ResponseRule.description: Mikhaila comments before player has returned w/ meds for her.

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila Loiter Comments -- Pre Medicine, General
ResponseRule.description: Mikhaila comments before player has returned w/ meds for her.

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila Sees Plyr -- Plyr Has Meds
ResponseRule.description: Player reaches Mikhaila. This time plyr has meds.

ResponseRule.name: Player Gives Mikhaila Her Meds
ResponseRule.description: Player gives Mikhaila her booster shots to deal with her Paraplexia condition.

ResponseRule.name: Plyr Returns to Mik, Power Rebooted, No Meds
ResponseRule.description: Player reaches Mikhaila where she's trapped. Player hasn't seen her in person yet, but has already rebooted the station. Player does not have her meds.

ResponseRule.name: Plyr Returns to Mik, Power Rebooted, All Better
ResponseRule.description: Player reaches Mikhaila where she's trapped. Mikhaila can't move. Parts of her body (motor control) are shutting down as her condition worsens over time.

ResponseRule.name: I'm Okay Now
ResponseRule.description: Player clicks Mikhaila. She's all better. (She'll show up in the player's office later).

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila: ClickMe Comments, Power Rebooted, All Better
ResponseRule.description: Follow-up lines after she's told the player she'll meet him back up in the office.

ResponseRule.name: Mikhaila: ClickMe Comments, Power Rebooted, No Meds
ResponseRule.description: Sad comments. Followup to congrats about the reactor, but she's still sick. Follow up comments.

ResponseRule.name: Hydrogen Leak -- Conversation Trigger
ResponseRule.description: Mikhaila warns player about hydrogen leak in the coolant chamber.

ResponseRule.name: MikhailaPA: Mik and Sara. Get to Safety.
ResponseRule.description: Broadcast in an empty stretch (space) or navigating corridors, etc., etc., but needs to be before the Cargo Bay. Foreshadows Mik and Sara and situation in Cargo.

ResponseRule.name: MikhailaPA: Help in The Power Plant
ResponseRule.description: Before Mikhaila is physically disabled, she tries a station-wide broadcast call for help.
